text: Australia competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics in London, England. 75 competitors, 66 men and 9 women, took part in 52 events in 11 sports. Australian athletes have competed in every Summer Olympic Games. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%;" |- ! Medal ! Name ! Sport ! Event !
